book.synopsis: An action-packed adventure filled with mystery and intrigue follows young apprentice Obi-Wan Kenobi as he enters a new realm of training with Jedi Master Qui-Gon Jinn. Original.
book.title_long: The Mark of the Crown (Star Wars: Jedi Apprentice, Book 4)
